message.entry: Select a ROS 2 Point Cloud Topic

No topics are available from the ROS 2 network. <actions exclusiveFixIts="yes"> <action type="suggestion" retvalue="false"> <cmd>openDialog(ros.slros.internal.dlg.NetworkAddressSpecifier);</cmd> <txt>Check the ROS 2 network configuration</txt> </action> </actions>

No image topics are available from the ROS 2 network. <actions exclusiveFixIts="yes"> <action type="suggestion" retvalue="false"> <cmd>openDialog(ros.slros.internal.dlg.NetworkAddressSpecifier);</cmd> <txt>Check the ROS 2 network configuration</txt> </action> </actions>

No point cloud topics are available from the ROS 2 network. <actions exclusiveFixIts="yes"> <action type="suggestion" retvalue="false"> <cmd>openDialog(ros.slros.internal.dlg.NetworkAddressSpecifier);</cmd> <txt>Check the ROS 2 network configuration</txt> </action> </actions>

No scan topics are available from the ROS 2 network. <actions exclusiveFixIts="yes"> <action type="suggestion" retvalue="false"> <cmd>openDialog(ros.slros.internal.dlg.NetworkAddressSpecifier);</cmd> <txt>Check the ROS 2 network configuration</txt> </action> </actions>
